item.description:
The concerts will be held on the Lawn of the Rose Garden, every Wednesday 6:30 pm until 8:00 pm. If it rains, the concerts will be held in the Pond House hall.

This is our own little Tanglewood, right in Hartford. But, admission is free! Just bring your dancing shoes. Again, if it rains, the show will go on! We will move indoors to the Pond House hall, so plan to spend every Wednesday evening with us, at Elizabeth Park. Come early, and bring a picnic dinner.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Sounds of Frank Sinatra at Elizabeth Park
